messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WHO WANTS TO GO TO A 5 STAR HOTEL WITH AU SUITE ROOMS A HUGE KITCHEN AND A SPA i know you do so why dont you come down to the bar for telleportation its free after all and out staff will catter to your needs once on board the luxuriuse hotel

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Jhonson lutherfild is the real captain, and we can clone this dead people.
